experience.title: experience
experience.description:
Over the past 7+ years, I have gained extensive experience as a Full Stack Engineer, working on a wide range of technologies and projects. I have led development teams, collaborated with partners for product engineering, and worked in agile environments on scalable and distributed web applications. My expertise spans frontend technologies like React and Angular, backend frameworks such as .Net Core and Node.js, and cloud platforms including AWS and Azure.

I have contributed to various projects, including APM products, DevOps tools, and audit applications, utilizing my skills in both frontend and backend development, as well as my knowledge of AI and cloud technologies.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a Full Stack Engineer, I have developed strong skills in both frontend and backend technologies. My key technical skills include:

Frontend: React, Angular, Next.js
Backend: .Net Core Web API, Node.js, Python, Nest.js
AI: OpenAI, VectorDB, RAG Document Chat, Text2SQL
Languages & Frameworks: JavaScript, TypeScript
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MSSQL, Redis, Qdrant Vector DB
DevOps & Cloud: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS (EKS, EC2), Azure, CI/CD
Other: RESTful APIs, Microservices, WebSockets, Git, JIRA, Azure DevOps

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring more than technical expertise to my role. My soft skills include:

- Excellent problem-solving abilities
- Strong communication skills
- Quick learning aptitude
- Collaborative team player
- Leadership experience as a Tech Lead
- Adaptability to new technologies and environments

bio.title: bio
bio.description: I am a passionate Full Stack Engineer with 7+ years of experience in IT. I specialize in building scalable web applications using modern technologies and have a keen interest in AI and cloud computing. My diverse skill set allows me to contribute effectively to all stages of the software development lifecycle.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am constantly learning and expanding my knowledge in the field of technology. My current interests include artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and emerging web technologies. I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and applying new concepts to solve complex problems.

education.title: education
education.description:
I have always been passionate about technology and continuous learning. My educational background includes:

- Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from CSMU, Kanpur (December 2021)
- Bachelor of Commerce from University of Mumbai (March 2017)

Additionally, I have obtained certifications in Azure (AZ-900), AWS Cloud Practitioner, and CKAD, which have further enhanced my skills in cloud technologies and Kubernetes.

files.university: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from CSMU, Kanpur

1.title: Infinity AIWatch
1.description: An APM Product collecting data from different monitoring tools and displaying it in various dashboards.

2.title: Infinity DevOps
2.description: Led a team of 10 developers and cloud engineers in developing a product in collaboration with cloud technologies.

3.title: Enrico Project
3.description: Led development team for an Audit Application using a SaaS model and MEAN stack technology.
